description: old woman at right, spinning at a wheel, with an old man seated to her right, in the corner of a room with flowered wallpaper

inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

at top of image, on negative in white: illegible inscription; lower left corner, impressed in paper: [AUG. SANDER / KÖLN / LINDENTHAL]
signed: lower right corner on mount below image, in pencil: [(illegible) Sander / (illegible) 1911.]; on back of mount, in pencil: [April 27, 1981 / S #10]; on back, photographer\'s stamp; lower left corner, impressed in paper: [AUG. SANDER / KOLN / LINDENTHAL]
title: Peasant Couple, Germany
